Class Controls

java.lang.Object
  Controls
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener
public class Controls
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.KeyListener

Created by Calvin on 4/12/20 

This class is based off of the idea and some code from here:
 http://gamedev.stackexchange.com/questions/56017/java-best-implementation-keylistener-for-games
Gets key presses to control the player Could make this an inner class in player handler, but this controller could be used elsewhere
